text: “۞ Ndithudi, uwapeza anthu amene ali oyipitsitsa pa chidani ndi anthu okhulupirira (Asilamu) ndi Ayuda komanso opembedza mafano. Ndipo uwapeza oyandikira ubwenzi ndi okhulupirira (Asilamu) ndi awo akunena kuti: “Ife ndi Akhrisitu.” Zimenezo n’chifukwa chakuti mwa iwo alipo ophunzira ndi oopa Allah, ndi chifukwanso chakuti iwo (Akhirisitu) sadzitukumula
